data.title: Alexandra Chando: Credits, Bio, News & More
data.meta_description: Searching to find out more about Alexandra Chando? We have a full Biography, Photos, Theatre Credits, TV and Movies, Videos and more! Check out Alexandra Chando's bio now including film and tv, as well as on stage.
data.text:
Alexandra Chando News

MAMMOTH FILM FESTIVAL Set For Takeoff March 2-6, 2023

Mammoth Film Festival has emerged as one of the fastest growing festivals in the world. This year's edition takes place March 2-6, 2023 and is one of the most highly anticipated destination festivals on the calendar for filmmakers and film lovers globally.

Mammoth Film Festival Unveils First Round Of 2023 Program Featuring Over 80 Films

The highly anticipated Mammoth Film Festival, taking place from March 2 to 6, 2023, has announced the first round of this year's robust program.

DESERTED Musical Short Film Announces Virtual Premiere

Allie Gonino (Actress, Musician & Producer) and Alexandra Chado (Director, Actress & Producer) have announced their Virtual Premiere of their Musical Short Film 'Deserted' on January 27th 2021 at 5pm pst/8pm est. Ticket for the event is $12.00 with proceeds benefitting Futures Without Violence. T

Mammoth Film Festival Sets California Premiere For Zac Efron's Ted Bundy Film EXTREMELY WICKED, SHOCKINGLY EVIL AND VILE

Announced today, The 2nd Annual Mammoth Film Festival will have the California premiere of EXTREMELY WICKED, SHOCKINGLY EVIL AND VILE film starring Zac Efron as Ted Bundy, Lily Collins, Haley Joel Osment, Kaya Scodelario, John Malkovich, and Jim Parsons. This marks the film's second festival premiere after it made a splash at Sundance.

2nd Annual Mammoth Film Festival Sets Josh Duhamel's Directorial Debut THE BUDDY GAMES

2nd Annual Mammoth Film Festival Sets Josh Duhamel's Directorial Debut THE BUDDY GAMES, STARRING Olivia Munn, Dax Shepard, and More as Closing Night Gala World Premiere

2nd Annual Mammoth Film Festival Sets Josh Duhamel's Directorial Debut THE BUDDY GAMES

2nd Annual Mammoth Film Festival Sets Josh Duhamel's Directorial Debut THE BUDDY GAMES, STARRING Olivia Munn, Dax Shepard, and More as Closing Night Gala World Premiere

Jennifer Morrison's SUN DOGS Wins Best Picture At Mammoth Film Festival

The inaugural Mammoth Film Festival came to a close last night with a standing-room only Awards Ceremony held at the Canyon Lodge in Mammoth Lakes, CA. Jennifer Morrison took home the top prize, Best Picture for her film Sun Dogs which closed the festival earlier that day. Sun Dogs also took home a total of 3 Awards last night, including the Grand Jury Prize. The film was recently Acquired by Netflix. The indie thriller Josie starring Sophie Turner also took home 3 Awards. Screen Media recently acquired the film and will release it in theaters and On Demand in March. Sophie Turner won the Best Actress Award. Sons of St. Clair the documentary chronicling Bone Thugs N Harmony's Krayzie Bone & Bizzy Bone Directed by Tim Newfang took home Best Documentary Award.

Inaugural Mammoth Film Festival Announces Round 2 of It's Official Selection Lineup

The organizers behind the upcoming inaugural Mammoth Film Festival are unleashing Round 2 of their Official Selections lineup for the festival taking place February 8-11. The organizers are thrilled to announce an unprecedented 120 film projects in competition (15 features, 6 of which are world premieres and 105 shorts) at this first-year event. The complete lineup, schedule and tickets are available for purchase now at: www.mammothfilmfestival.org.The festival will award over $20,000 in filmmaker prizes and funds.

VIDEO: Sneak Peek - New VH1 Series HINDSIGHT, Premiering 1/7

What if you could go back in time and do it all over again? What would you do differently? That is the question VH1's new scripted series 'Hindsight' poses when it premieres Wednesday, January 7, 2015

Danny Burstein, Jennifer Laura Thompson & More Sign on for CONSTRUCTION Film

Vision Vehicle Productions announced today that the independent studio has sold worldwide rights to its next two features, PASS THE LIGHT and CONSTRUCTION, to DigiNext. Both films will be released theatrically and downstream through DigiNext's unique direct-to-consumer (DtoC) platform, a customized end-to-end solution for independent features and documentaries. Digiplex (NASDAQ: DCIN), DigiNext's JV co-owner with Nehst Out, agreed to be acquired by Carmike Cinemas (NASDAQ: CKEC), the nation's fourth largest exhibitor, in a transaction announced in May. Inclusive of the 200+ screens being purchased, Carmike's domestic footprint will expand to approximately 3,000 screens across 41 states. Vision Vehicle Productions' features will be the first narrative films to utilize this unique theatrical release and DtoC distribution platform.

VIDEO: Sneak Peek - 'Limelight' Episode of ABC's CASTLE

On the next episode of ABC's CASTLE titled 'Limelight', when a rising young pop star is found dead in an alley, Castle and Beckett delve into the victim's out-of-control hard-partying lifestyle

ABC Family Cancels THE LYING GAME

This morning, THE LYING GAME star Alexandra Chando, who played twins Emma and Sutton on the ABC Family show, revealed on Instagram that the network has canceled her series.

ABC Family Noncommittal When it Comes to THE LYING GAME, BUNHEADS' Future

ABC Family is taking the noncommittal route when it comes to renewing The Lying Game and BUNHEADS.

VIDEO: Sneak Peek - Winter Finale of ABC Family's THE LYING GAME

Events of recent weeks finally reach the breaking point in the winter finale of "The Lying Game," airing on March 12 (9:00-10:00 PM ET/PT) on ABC Family. Get a sneak peek below!

VIDEO: Sneak Peek - 'Bride & Go Seek' on ABC Family's THE LYING GAME

Trouble looms on the horizon as Dan & Theresa's wedding day arrives in a brand-new episode of THE LYING GAME, airing on February 26 (9:00-10:00 PM ET/PT) on ABC Family. Get a sneak peek below!

VIDEO: Sneak Peek - 'Regret's Only' on ABC Family's THE LYING GAME

Rebecca's plan to break-up Kristin and Ted gets some help from an unlikely source in a brand-new episode of "The Lying Game," airing on February 19 (9:00-10:00 PM ET/PT) on ABC Family. Get a sneak peek below!

Photo Flash: THE LYING GAME's 'Catch Her In The Lie'

On THE LYING GAME's upcoming episode, 'Catch Her In The Lie' the Flipside Formal offers Emma the chance to try and trap Rebecca and Sutton in a lie, but she needs Ethan's help to pull it off.

VIDEO: Sneak Peek - 'Much Ado About Everything' Episode of ABC Family's THE LYING GAME

Laurel starts to ask questions about Sutton's radical personality changes in a brand new episode of THE LYING GAME, airing on February 5 (9:00-10:00 PM ET/PT) on ABC Family. Check out clips from the episode below!

VIDEOS: First Look - Next Week's All New Episode of THE LYING GAME

In the episode, "A Kiss Before Lying," Emma learns more about what happened the night Sutton's car went into the lake, raising her suspicions about whether her sister has been truthful. Ted invites his family to be his guests at an event in his honor and Rebecca orders Sutton to use the opportunity to further their plans for the Mercer family. Meanwhile, Emma heeds Laurel's romantic advice and Rebecca and Alec engage in a game of cat and mouse against each other. 'The Lying Game' airs on Jan. 29 at 9 PM on ABC Family.
